page.title: 08OUR SPARE TIME-LT.GAD.AREA
page.content: In our spare time most children watch T.V. and ride bikes.Sometimes people read books and newspapers.Our latest thing is probably 'Stinkky Stickers'.Stinky Stickers are things that you scratch and then smell.Some people go out into the woods and take their dogs for a walk or build camps.On Tuesday boys have Cubs,then on Thursdays girls have Brownies.Quite a few people do gardening.Some people do sports as well like cricket,tennis, football,horse-riding and net-ball.A lot of people go jogging in the woods, not just to keep fit but to enjoy the veiws.A large number of people play golf and go swimming at Dear Leap.But Dear Leap is an open air swimming pool so in the winter you would have to go to Tring or to Hemel Hempsted.There are two Youth Clubs, one attached to the local Church.
